sense.gloss: foolhardiness, recklessness, savage valour, savage valor, brute courage

sdata.j: どのチームが↑一番↑↓いち|ばん↓↑優勝↑↓ゆう|しょう↓しそうですか。
sdata.e: Which team is the most likely to win the championship?
